The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) invites qualified contractors to submit their proposals for a Building Condition Assessment (BCA) project at 1 Arctic Avenue, St. John's, NL A1B 3T5.

## Project Objectives
The objective of this project is to conduct a thorough assessment of the physical condition of the buildings to provide accurate data for capital planning, restoration, and replacement of the assets. This assessment will focus on the condition of the building structure, envelope, electrical, and mechanical systems.

## Project Scope
The scope of work includes:

* Conducting a site visit to collect data and observe the buildings' physical condition
* Preparing a detailed report outlining the building's history, condition rating, and maintenance requirements
* Identifying areas that require essential corrective or remedial action
* Providing a replacement value or replacement cost new for each building element
* Presenting capital cost plans for a 25-year life-cycle of the buildings and elements

## Assessment Criteria
Assessments will be conducted in accordance with the Uniformat II Level system.

## Notice To Bidder
Qualified contractors are invited to submit their proposals by February 8, 2023, at 12:30 PM EST.
